    • Uses of HistogramBuilder in org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations.bucket.histogram

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HistogramBuilder HistogramBuilder.extendedBounds(Long min, Long max)
      Set extended bounds for the histogram.

      Sets the interval for the histogram.
      HistogramBuilder HistogramBuilder.minDocCount(long minDocCount)
      Sets the minimum document count per bucket.
      HistogramBuilder HistogramBuilder.offset(long offset)
      Set the offset to apply to shift bucket boundaries.
      HistogramBuilder HistogramBuilder.order(Histogram.Order order)
      Sets the order by which the buckets will be returned.
